experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of young inflorescences of AP1âˆ·AtIPT4 Arabidopsis thaliana transgenic plants to identify the candidate genes responsive to cytokinin

description.text: The aim of this experiment is to identify the candidate genes responsive to cytokinin in Arabidopsis floral development. For this purpose, AtIPT4 gene under the control of the AP1 promoter was transformed into wild type plants of Arabidopsis. The transcriptional profiles of the young inflorescence of AP1::AtIPT4 transformants and wild-type plants are compared.

bibliography.authors: Li XG, Su YH, Zhao XY, Li W, Gao XQ, Zhang XS
bibliography.title: Cytokinin-Regulated Floral Development at Least Partially Mediated by CUC2 and CUC3 in Arabidopsis
